      • addCourse

        public boolean addCourse(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String section)
        Checks to see if you can add a course to your schedule. Does not allow duplicates Also does not allow schedule to be added if it is not on the catalog. Adds course to schedule.
        Parameters:
        name - name of course to be added
        section - section of course to be added
        Returns:
        true if course can be added to schedule, false if course is already on schedule

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(java.lang.String eventTitle,
                     java.lang.String eventMeetingDays,
                     int eventStartTime,
                     int eventEndTime,
                     int eventWeeklyRepeat,
                     java.lang.String eventDetails)
        Checks to see if you can add an event to your schedule. Does not allow duplicates Also does not allow schedule to be added if it is not on the catalog. Adds event to schedule.
        Parameters:
        eventTitle - Title of event to be added
        eventMeetingDays - Days of the week that the event will occur
        eventStartTime - Time of day that event will begin
        eventEndTime - Time of day that event will end
        eventWeeklyRepeat - How many weeks with this event repeat for
        eventDetails - Details describing what the event is

      • removeActivity

        public boolean removeActivity(int idx)
        Checks to see if you can remove a course from you schedule and then if allowed removes the course from the schedule.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of the activity to be removed from schedule
        Returns:
        true if you can remove the course from schedule, false if you cannot remove the course from the schedule

      • resetSchedule

        public void resetSchedule()
        Resets the schedule and clears all courses

        Parameters:
        title - Title of the schedule
